content: Since - goes to HSub.hSub, it seems that it is "stuck" as left-associative. If I wanted to define a Sub action on a set that is right-associative, as subtraction is in some contexts, is that possible? Or is it stuck as left-associative throughout all of Lean?

I think you should consider it to be stuck.

Maybe you can get inspiration from docs#Matrix.mulVec and docs#Matrix.vecMul, which define a right-associative *ᵥ and a left-associative ᵥ*, respectively.
I see, I suppose - with some subscript or other modification would be reasonable
Alex Meiburg has marked this topic as resolved.
